channel.description: Recent content in imagej on Jean Bilheux

item.title: How to create a movie from a stack of images
item.description: This guide will show you how to create a simple movie (.avi) from a stack of images using ImageJ. Step 1 - Go to the ORNL CG1D Analysis computer This step is described in detail in our Neutron Imaging Tutorial web page - Connect to our computer. Step 2 - Start ImageJ Navigate to the ImageJ program from the menu and then click OK to close the dialog box that pops up.
